title: Bard Icon
body:
Hey there , 
my name is lowis and iam a very dedicated Bard player as you can see and in the couple days there came some questions up in my head for example why is there no Bard icon (The Bard-nova Icon doesnt count because lets be honest it is really ugly as hell)but for almost every othere champion there is one that is atleast related to them.So i wanted to ask you guys from the designe team how long it would take to put Bard or one of his Meeps on a icon and release it. Because i would really love to show my main Champion with a cool looking icon.
Thank you for taking some time and reading this you can post some other icon ideas down below if you have any i would love to see some cool concepts.
Have a good one 
OneTríckBard{{champion:432}}

replies.body: Is there an icon for poppy? Is there an icon for Urgot? is there an icon for Yorick? No, no, and no :<
Not that much champions have an icon for itself but a Snowday bard icon would be cool
